description: By utilizing fabric scraps and recycled bottles, this 100% recycled garment reduces their reliance on virgin materials. Know better; do better.
name: Patagonia Ridge Rise Moonlight Uprisal Hoody - Unisex

specs.value: Made of 100% recycled knit fleece with a brushed interior and natural stretch; soft, durable fabric is a blend of 55% postconsumer recycled polyester and 45% recycled cotton
